name: appleMapping_create
description: Create a mapping for an existing app in apple store for the specified application.

apple_id.description: ID of the apple application in apple store, takes precedence over bundle_identifier when both are provided

bundle_identifier.description: Bundle Identifier of the apple package

service_connection_id.description: Id for the shared service connection. In case of Apple AppStore, this connection will be used to create and connect to the Apple AppStore in Mobile Center.

team_identifier.description: ID of the Team associated with the app in apple store

$ul: **app_id**: ID of the apple application in Mobile Center
**apple_id**: ID of the apple application in apple store
**service_connection_id**: Id for the shared service connection. In case of Apple AppStore, this connection will be used to create and connect to the Apple AppStore in Mobile Center.
**team_identifier**: ID of the Team associated with the app in apple store
